Event.name: Mining
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Miner</fen> attempts to obtain a desirable <fen>Resource</fen>, rocks and minerals, located in a <fen>Place</fen> being mined, by digging or tunneling in the ground.
<ex><fex name="Miner">They</fex> <t>mine</t> <fex name="Resource">diamonds</fex> <fex name="Place">in Africa</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Resource
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Resource</fen> is usually buried in the ground, and is searched for by the <fen>Miner</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location in which the <fen>Miner</fen> searches for the <fen>Resource</fen></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The means by which the <fen>Miner</fen> uses to obtain the <fen>Resource</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The success or failure of the attempt to obtain the <fen>Resource</fen> by the <fen>Miner</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Miner</fen> obtains the <fen>Resource</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: mine.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: the extraction of a valuable resource from the earth.

lexUnit.name: miner.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an entity that extracts a valuable resource from the earth.

lexUnit.name: extract.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: the process of removing resources from the earth.
